titles.title: A resolution to appoint the chairman of Environment and Public Works Committee and the Chairman of the Committee on Finance.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Appoints: (1) Senator Max Baucus as chairman of the Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works; and (2) Senator Daniel Patrick Moynihan as chairman of the Senate Committee on Finance.
